department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Nanophotonics
course.description: Recent developments in micro- and nano-photonic materials, devices and microscopy. Computational electromagnetics. Photonic crystals. Optical properties of metal nanostructures. Optical forces. Scanning near-field optical microscopy. Term-long research project.
course.prerequisites: Electromagnetism (Applied Physics 50b, Physics 11b (no longer offered)or 15b, Physical Sciences 12b, or Engineering Sciences 151 or equivalent).
course.notes: Open to graduate students and advanced undergraduates.
